```{r}

df <- read.csv('type_destination_scores.csv')

col_names_space <- unique(df$type)

col_names_to_keep_space <- col_names_space[c(3, 5, 7, 8)]

col_names <- str_replace_all(col_names_to_keep_space, ' ', '_')


df <- df[df$type %in% col_names_to_keep_space, ]

mat <- df[1:1000, ] %>% spread(fromId, score, fill = NA, convert = FALSE) %>% t()

mat
```
